body:
### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I would be willing to contribute this feature with guidance from the MLflow community.

### Proposal Summary

Add step argument to mlflow.log_figure()

Add slider in ui to navigate over time/steps.

### Motivation

> #### What is the use case for this feature?

It is currently impossible to analyze the dynamic of metrics visualized via figures (histograms, confusion matrices, roc curves, model outputs, etc.)

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?

A substantial part of model design uses instrumentation beyond simple scalar values over time.

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for your project(s) or organization?

I monitor the dynamics of confusion matrices during training.

> #### Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case?

The current workaround is to save plots as separate files which is inconvenient in terms of navigation. One cannot compare multiple figures from a run or across runs simultaneously.
